caption.title: Correspondence of each sequence to current classification, mPTP and ABGD clusters for both the HBV and HCV datasets
caption.p: In the first column is provided the NCBI Accession Numbers and the code name of each sequence. In the following columns is the correspondance of each sequence to (1) the Maximum likelihood mPTP clusters (2) the ABGD clusters under the parameters that yielded the closest result to current taxonomy (see main text and Fig. 3), (3) the currently aknowledged genotypes and (4) subgenotypes (HBV) or subtypes (HCV).
Click here for additional data file.
